header.description: Report header scalars: date range supplied by the user and a runtime-generated timestamp. No database lookup required for header fields.

rows.description: One row per device record from app_devices. Includes device identity, protocol, connectivity status, port, latency, auto-reconnect flag, and last error string.

totals.description: No totals section in this template.

semantics: date_from and date_to are pass-through parameters displayed in the report header and footer; they do not filter rows from app_devices. generated_at is a runtime-injected value (current timestamp at generation time) and has no catalog source.
transformations: Select all columns directly from app_devices â€” no reshape, no pivot, no union.
Format row_latency_ms to 1 decimal place for display.
Inject generated_at as the current report generation timestamp at runtime.
